paper_abstract: Stationary ergodic processes with finite alphabets are approximated by finite memory processes based on an n-length realization of the process. Under the assumptions of summable continuity rate and non-nullness, a rate of convergence in (d) over bar -distance is obtained, with explicit constants. Asymptotically, as n --> infinity, the result is near the optimum.
paper_title: On Rate of Convergence of Statistical Estimation of Stationary Ergodic Processes
